DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare if the effect of levobupivacaine on autonomic nervous system smaller than that of bupivacaine.
DOC.brief_title: Levobupivacaine on Heart Rate Variability (HRV) in Spinal Anesthesia
DOC.detailed_description: Obtain the heart rate variability (in means and standard deviation, including the high frequency, low frequency and its ratio) data of before and after spinal anesthesia with ECG (and Heart Rate Variability Analyzer) in 2 groups. Meanwhile, record the blood pressure on each subject.
DOC.criteria: Indicated for spinal anesthesia Allergic reaction to local anesthetics Coagulopathy Severe spinal deformity Cardiac diseases Metabolic diseases (such as DM, thyroid or adrenal diseases)
DOC.keyword: Responses of ANS to these two drugs
